App.jsx
=======

Main application component for the frontend.

Overview
--------

- Manages splash screen visibility and fade effect.
- Provides weather context to the app.
- Renders the Dashboard component.

Props and State
---------------

- **showSplash**: Controls splash screen visibility.
- **fade**: Controls fade-out effect.

Hooks Used
----------

- **useState**
- **useEffect**

Related Components
------------------

- Dashboard
- SplashScreen
- WeatherProvider
